twilioIntegration.description: Configuration for connecting Twilio phone numbers to Vapi assistant
setup_instructions: 1. Purchase a phone number in Twilio Console (https://console.twilio.com/)
2. In Vapi Dashboard, go to Phone Numbers section
4. Enter your Twilio Account SID and Auth Token
5. Select the phone number to import
6. Assign the Counter assistant to this phone number

sipTrunkConfiguration.description: Vapi automatically configures SIP trunk when you import a Twilio number

inboundCallConfiguration.firstMessage: Hi, this is Counter, your real estate assistant. How can I help you find a home today?

outboundCallConfiguration.description: Outbound calls not required for MVP - users call in to Counter

testingChecklist: Call the Twilio number and verify connection
Test that assistant responds with first message
Verify audio quality (clear, no echo, low latency)
Test interruption handling (speak while assistant is talking)
Test from different phone types (mobile, landline)
Check call logs in Vapi dashboard

troubleshooting.noAudioOnCall: Check Twilio webhook configuration points to Vapi SIP endpoint
troubleshooting.highLatency: Verify Twilio region matches Vapi region (use US for both)
troubleshooting.callDrops: Check Twilio account balance and verify no rate limits
troubleshooting.echoIssues: Enable echo cancellation in Twilio console under Voice settings
